english.segment1: Day after day my heart beats for You. Wanting You near beside me always
english.segment2: Lord I won't fear as long as You're here. In my life I need You always
english.segment3: I cry for You to heal me forgive me. I cry for You to save me to know me more
english.segment4: Day after day my eyes long to see You. Show me Your face and hold me close in Your arms
english.segment5: I cry for You to heal me forgive me. I cry for You to love me to know me more
english.segment6: I cry for You to heal me forgive me. I cry for You to save me to know me more
english.segment7: I cry for You to heal me to save me. And I cry for You to love me forgive me
english.segment8: I cry for You to hear me to save me. I love You be near me
